title: Kotlin Foundation Announces Grants Program Winners
content: The Kotlin Foundation has recently announced the winners of their grants program, which attracted a large number of talented authors from various areas of the Kotlin ecosystem. With a total of 109 applications, the Ecosystem Committee carefully reviewed each project and selected five winners based on their quality, proposals, and alignment with the foundation's criteria. Each grant recipient will receive $6,000 to further develop and expand their open-source projects. For those who did not receive a grant this time, the foundation encourages them to continue developing their projects and stay updated for future opportunities. Developers can follow the Kotlin Foundation's website and social media for updates and announcements on subsequent rounds of the grant program. Contact the foundation at hello@kotlinfoundation.org for more information. Supported and developed by JetBrains.
